footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Yun Jin | Update Date: 08/08/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Favonius Lance__ Generates energy for the team while also giving Yun Jin extra Energy Recharge from the substat.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Deathmatch__ High CRIT Rate substat and DEF% passive will boost Yun Jin's buff and damage but requires significantly more Energy Recharge from artifacts.

__Engulfing Lighting__ Provides alot of Energy Recharge for Yun Jin but the ATK% bonus is wasted on Yun Jin. Better suited for other characters.

__The Catch/Prototype Starglitter__ Useful Energy Recharge substat, no other utility.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> DEF% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  DEF% |<circlet>  DEF%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Cliffbreaker's Banner
**2)** Elemental Skill: Opening Flourish
**3)** Normal Attack: Cloud-grazing Strike

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: DEF scaling characters benefit more than ATK scaling characters from level 90 due to how stat scaling works.
